entry.title: DEVIL’S KNOB FIRE NOW 86 PERCENT CONTAINED
entry.summary: September 22, 2024 2:00 p.m. The Devil’s Knob Fire is 86 percent contained as of midday Sunday. entry.title: Get to know Douglas ESD: Building student success
entry.summary: Student success is a priority for public school districts in Douglas County. To support this goal, Douglas Education Service District provides ongoing training for educators. This complements the outstanding work already taking place within 48 schools across the county.

entry.title: Anniversary: Bill and Barbara Woolstenhulme
entry.summary: Bill F. and Barbara L. Woolstenhulme celebrate their 70th wedding anniversary Sept. 24.

entry.title: Made in Douglas County-BL Performance: a business inspired by love and tragedy

entry.title: Growing coast redwoods in Umpqua earns the Hubers Tree Farmer of the Year
entry.summary: The Douglas Small Woodland Association named Jacob and Mary Huber of Huber Ranch as the Tree Farmers of the Year 2024. This is due to their excellent example of forestry and woodland stewardship, according to the association.
